test.name: Does the Content-Type in a token response set correctly?
test.description: This test verifies the head Content-Type set to application/json in the token response.

test.name: Does the token_type of a token response set correctly?
test.description: This test verifies whether the token_type of a token response is Bearer.

test.name: Does the entity return a correct Content-Type in the EC response
test.description: In this test a correct request to the entity's /.well-known/openid-federation endpoint is made and the response is analyzed. It must have a Content-Type parameter set to application/entity-statement+jwt
